verses.roman:
tabe kālidāsa śloka paḍi' śunāila
śuni' jhaḍu-ṭhākurera baḍa sukha ha-ila

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; kālidāsa—Kālidāsa; śloka—verses; paḍi'-reciting; śunāila—caused to hear; śuni'-hearing; jhaḍu-ṭhākurera—of Jhaḍu Ṭhākura; baḍa—very great; sukha—happiness; ha-ila—there was.
translation: Kālidāsa then recited some verses, which Jhaḍu Ṭhākura was very happy to hear.
